title: Ground Beef Tacos
description: Ground Beef Tacos - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Cook onion in oil 3 minutes. Add beef, break into pieces. Brown 5-7 minutes.
Add garlic, chili powder, cumin, oregano. Cook 1 minute.
Add broth and vinegar. Simmer until mostly absorbed, 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas. Serve with onion, cilantro, salsa, lime.
notes: 80/20 has enough fat for juicy tacos.
